input.sentences: here are some pics we took at the halloween party last week . this is the line getting in .
next we have deviled eggs [male] and [male] !
here is our friend [male] dressed as a nun by some oriental honeys !
and here we have a hawaiian dancer with greg and [male] having a great time .
output.sentences: Wrapping up a morale-boosting Spirit Week, employees have shared their favorite pics from the costume party.
The Accounting Department, dressed as Hooters Girls, took first place for Best Group Costume.
The male members of the Legal Team came in second place, dressed as over-easy eggs, deviled.
The User Experience team, dressed in authentic oriental garb and real nun vestiture, did pretty well coming in third, considering they are all male.
In no time at all, the Grand Prize for Best Individual Costume went to Tricia in Quality Assurance, as the large male portion of the company appreciated her Hawaiian luau outfit.
